attributes.action: Ensure that Translink operatring as Northern Ireland Railways provide at least the same level of service and rolling stock throughout the Northern Ireland Railway Network and immediately redeploy those new trains used in the Republic of Ireland for exclusive use on the Northern Ireland rail network, by taxpayers who have directly contributed to the purchase of the new rolling stock.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Approximately 2 years ago Translink acquired new trains for use on the Northern Ireland rail network. They have specifically excluded the Larne line from benefiting from these and have refused to distribute them equally throughout the Northern Ireland rail network. Indeed they use them frequently in the Republic of Ireland despite the fact that funding was provided by the Northern Ireland Assembly to replace old trains currently in use in Northern Ireland. Passengers on the Larne line are denied the use of these new trains despite having higher passenger numbers prior to their introduction than other lines. This is a scandalous misappropriation of funds.
